description: Łukasz Piszczek (Polish pronunciation:  born 3 June 1985) is a Polish footballer who plays for German Bundesliga club Borussia Dortmund and the Poland national team as a right-back, having previously played for Hertha BSC and Zagłębie Lubin. He has been capped over 50 times by Poland at international level from his debut in 2007, and was included in the nation's squads for three UEFA European Championships.
name: Łukasz Piszczek
